channel.title: Super mega important!
channel.description:
ok its come to my attention that 1 highclass member has become very bad behaved and is posting uneeded threads but then why is he doing it? well because theres no mods or admins online and why isn't there any online? well because theres not enough mods or admins. i almost got banned from my computer when my parents came in the room and thought i was looking at porn but i was lucky not to get banned so what do u think? hire more mods? make sure at least 1 mod is on?
Any more suggestions post here

item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Are you talking about p a r t y b o y?
[/quote]

I have no idea what is he trying. He is just posting ans posting!
He dont even have useful information on his posts!
He post shit like this: “i agree” “lol” “useless” “i dont need that”
Omfg kill him![/quote]
I just went through his(partyboy) posts and deleted the spam.

Cryptic is (hopefully) going to get banned as soon as an admin comes online.

E: Deleted Cryptic’s post on the server ip thread.
